attributes.action: campiagn to bring gymnastic tumbling and sport acro into the 2012and future olympic games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
along side Rt Hon Andy Burnham MP  minister for sport,Olympics Minister, Tessa Jowell,HRH The Princess Royal (President of the British Olympic Association  English Gymnasts are the best in the world at these disiplines holding british,euopean and world titles  .this sport has grown tremendously worldwid with an estimated 250000 clubs.The 18th International Acrobatic Gymnastics Tournament was held in Vinnitsa (UKR) on February 23-28, 2009 the number of participating countries  increased to 20, with a total of 300 individuals participating this year. The Maia International Acro Cup 2009 is scheduled to take place March 4 – 8, 2009 in Maia,with 23 delegations from Portugal, Belgium, Great Britain, Switzerland, USA, Spain and Puerto Ricoo  with a total of 203 gymnasts having registered and will compete
so we have the Gymnastics.This should be part of the olympics as it is exciting to watch and more important when this disipline becomes part of the olympics it will have a tremendous impact on the sport the Prime minister  says
EVERY CHILD MATTERS, pleas prove it to them, give them the chance to excell at this disipline and become olympians

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to campiagn to bring gymnastic tumbling and sport acro into the 2012and future olympic games.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=tumbling-2012


Her Majesty's Government
